articles.description: Syracuse men's lacrosse opened the 2026 season against Boston U at the JMA Dome on Sunday afternoon.
articles.content:
Syracuse, N.Y. The Syracuse University mens lacrosse team opened a season of great expectations at the JMA Dome with a 13-6 win against Boston University. 
The Terriers hung in there for a half, but… [+3508 chars]
